message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth, I propose a price of $95 for you to acquire this exceptional item. I trust this offer aligns well with your valuation and budget.

Thanks for the offer Alice. I appreciate the value you've placed on your product. However, $95 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. Would you be open to $85? I'm confident this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product while also working within my budget.

Thank you for considering my product, Bob. After reviewing your offer, I understand your position. I would like to counter with an offer of $90 for the product. This price reflects the value of the item while remaining within your budget constraints. I hope this proposal is more acceptable to you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. However, $90 is still a little higher than what I can comfortably spend right now. I'm going to stick with my previous offer of $85.  It's a fair price for the product, and I hope you'll reconsider.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. I am willing to meet you halfway and propose a final offer of $87.50 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both the value of the item and your financial situation. I hope you find this offer acceptable.
